item.title: This fintech stock is attractively valued and can rally nearly 40%, Citizens says
item.description: "SoFi is at an inflection point, with substantial earnings potential that we believe the market is currently undervaluing," the firm said.

item.title: Trump insists bond market tumult didn't influence tariff pause: 'I wasn't worried'
item.description: "I wasn't worried," Trump said in a Time magazine interview during which he was asked about financial market tumult.

item.title: Pro Talks: Top chip analyst on navigating the tech trade as tariff uncertainty grows
item.description: Jordan Klein, tech sector specialist at Mizuho Securities, joins CNBC's Kristina Partsinevelos to discuss which semiconductor stocks could be hardest ...

item.title: RBC upgrades this consumer giant after earnings led to a 'clearing event'
item.description: Consumer goods giant P&G on Thursday reported quarterly earnings that beat estimates, but revenue that disappointed, leading shares lower.

item.title: This online brokerage is a buy in this uncertain market environment, Goldman Sachs says
item.description: The firm estimated that Charles Schwab's earnings per share will compound at a 25% compound annual growth rate, or CAGR, through 2027.
